summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for a specific account held at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas for the period from October 1, 2017, to October 31, 2017. It details various transactions including deposits, withdrawals, and transfers, highlighting significant outgoing transfers to other banks and accounts.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield

connections.description: Stewart Oldfield serves as the account manager for Richard Kahn's account at Deutsche Bank.

events.title: Outgoing Money Transfer to JPMorgan Chase Bank
events.description: A transfer of $4,430.73 was made to JPMorgan Chase Bank, account of Richard Kahn.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter B3, St Thomas 00802, United States
keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $3,797,351.55 on October 1, 2017.
A total of $6,000,774.89 was credited to the account during the statement period.
Significant outgoing transfers included $2,250,000.00 to Silicon Valley Bank and $600,000.00 to Southern Trust Company.
Interest earned during the period was $774.89.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors or inquiries regarding the account.
